detectors.description:
BidProxy.withdrawEth() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#130-133) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#132)
detectors.markdown:
[BidProxy.withdrawEth()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#L130-L133) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [msg.sender.transfer(balance)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#L132)

detectors.description: Gem (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#3-15) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:Gem.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#9)

BidProxy.withdrawToken(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#125-128) ignores return value by ERC20(_token).transfer(msg.sender,balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#127)

BidProxy.joinDai(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#135-145) ignores return value by ERC20(DAI_ADDRESS).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amountDiff) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#141)

BidProxy.joinDai(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#135-145) ignores return value by ERC20(DAI_ADDRESS).approve(DAI_JOIN,amountDiff) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#142)
Pragma version^0.6.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BidProxy__1.sol#1) allows old versions
solc-0.6.12 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.6.12 is not recommended for deployment
